desc.zh-Hans: 参考了官方线路图和线路实际走向来绘制，并使用了2021年版的风格，将即将开通的15号线一期，4号线西延段。6号线东延段加入其中，部分线路的站点编号为预测估计，请勿作为显示参考。
desc.en: Drawing with reference to the official route map and the actual direction of the line, and using the style of the 2021 version, the first phase of Line 15 and the west extension of Line 4 will be opened. The east extension of Line 6 is added to it, and the station numbers of some lines are forecast estimates, so please do not use them as display references.

updateHistory.reason: Remove redundant node in the top left corner.
将暂未开通的5号线中段与10号线后段取消，更新谢家湾站内换乘与谢家湾、观音桥错误站名
